description: Motivated by the prospect of a late-day training session, you leave work early to meet a friend. The pace will be high and you're happy about it. Designed to perform, when the desire is to put in work, the Langnes cross-country skiing pant comes with windproof and water-resistant front panelling and brushed interior fabric for comfort, warmth and performance. Necessary elements for an exceptional few hours out. Designed for cross-country skiers chasing a fast pace.
name: Odlo Langnes Pants, Reg - Mens
